prompts.restore: Restore this old damaged photograph. Fix scratches, tears, stains, fading, and other damage. Enhance details, improve contrast, and make it look like a professional restoration while maintaining the original character and time period.
prompts.enhance: Enhance this photograph by improving quality, sharpness, and details. Increase resolution, reduce noise, improve lighting, and make colors more vibrant while keeping it natural.
prompts.colorize: Add realistic colors to this black and white photograph. Use historically accurate colors for the time period. Make skin tones natural, clothing appropriate for the era, and ensure the colorization looks authentic and not artificial.
